benchmark_details.name: Synthio
benchmark_details.overview: Synthio is a novel approach for augmenting small-scale audio classification datasets with synthetic data generated from text-to-audio (T2A) models, enhancing classification accuracy in low-resource settings.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve audio classification accuracy with limited labeled data by augmenting small-scale datasets.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Performance influenced by T2A model quality and training data.

data.source: Small-scale audio classification datasets and weakly-captioned datasets for training T2A models.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated across various datasets and configurations.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy reflects better model performance in classifying audio.
methodology.baseline_results: Synthio outperforms baselines by 0.1%-39% in accuracy.
methodology.validation: Holds significance in enhancing audio classification tasks.
